name: Dribble
description:
You bounce your orb to charge it with energy. Roll Dexterity. On a 10+, add 1 charge to the orb, and this ability does not consume a half action. On a 20+, add 1 additional charge. These charges persist within the orb so long as you or an ally remain in possession of it.

You may use this ability multiple times per turn, but not twice in a row.
